title: Why would they tear up the new bike path on Eastwood Road less then 2 years after building it? Did they get federal money to replace it with big and better ones? There are other parts of Eastwood that do not even have side walks. They should have spent the new found money on adding sidewalks and installing shelters at the bus stops.
